abilities.desc:
At the start of your turn, add 6 to your Action Pool, gain Shield 4, and you gain +3 maximum Range until the start of your next turn.
This Ability triggers only once per fight.
This Ability cannot trigger on Round 1.
abilities.trigger: at the start of your turn

Usable once per fight.
